short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas balloons is a mouse skill game where you will be given a certain numbers of balloon for you to pop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas balloons is a mouse skill game where you will be given a certain numbers of balloon for you to pop. Pop as many balloons as you can and beat your last highest score.
